info.title: Audio Tai Loc E-commerce API
info.description:
# Audio Tai Loc E-commerce API Documentation

This API provides endpoints for managing an e-commerce platform specializing in audio equipment.

## Features

- **Authentication**: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control
- **Products**: Full CRUD operations for product management
- **Categories**: Hierarchical category management
- **Cart**: Shopping cart functionality with session persistence
- **Orders**: Order processing and management
- **Payments**: Multiple payment method support (PayOS, COD, Bank Transfer)
- **Users**: User management and profiles
- **Inventory**: Real-time inventory tracking
- **Search**: Advanced product search with filters
- **Multilingual**: Support for Vietnamese and English

## Authentication

Most endpoints require authentication. Include the JWT token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

## Rate Limiting

API requests are rate-limited to prevent abuse:
- Anonymous users: 100 requests per 15 minutes
- Authenticated users: 1000 requests per 15 minutes

## Pagination

List endpoints support pagination with the following query parameters:
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `limit`: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

## Error Responses

All error responses follow this format:
```json
{
  "statusCode": 400,
  "message": "Error description",
  "error": "Bad Request"
}
```
